articles.title: Record-breaking heat wave sets its sights on the South as Midwest recovers from disastrous flooding - CNN
articles.description: A blistering heat wave is setting its sights on millions of Americans across the South and Plains on Monday, including several communities recovering from destructive flooding over the weekend. Here’s the latest.

articles.title: Copa América: Christian Pulisic, USMNT cruise past Bolivia - The Washington Post
articles.description: Christian Pulisic scored early and Bolivia rarely threatened as the Americans notched a 2-0 victory.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: NASA Sued After Space Junk Projectile Crashes Into Florida Home - ScienceAlert
articles.description: An American family is claiming more than $80,000 from NASA after a small piece of debris fell from space and smashed through the roof of their Florida home, a law firm said Friday.
